data_table.description: EDIC. Diabetic ketoacidosis of participants with Type 1 diabetes and involved in the "Diabetes Control and Complications Trial (DCCT) and Epidemiology of Diabetes Interventions and Complications Study (EDIC)" project.

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: EDIC form number

variable.name: CLINIC
variable.description: A1. Identifying information. Deidentified EDIC clinic number

variable.name: ICB1B
variable.description: B1b. Recognition of event. If date uncertain

variable.name: ICB3
variable.description: B3. Recognition of event. How did clinic learn of the event
variable.value: Annual medical history and physical exam
Clinic recognized event and informed patient

variable.name: ICC1
variable.description: C1. Nature of event. Was symptomatic diabetic state present

variable.name: ICC2A
variable.description: C2a. Nature of event. Were serum ketones present

variable.name: ICC2B
variable.description: C2b. Nature of event. Were large/moderate ketones in urine

variable.name: ICC3AI
variable.description: C3ai. Nature of event. Was arterial blood pH less than 7.30

variable.name: ICC3AII
variable.description: C3aii. Nature of event. Record arterial blood pH level

variable.name: ICC3BI
variable.description: C3bi. Nature of event. Was venous blood pH less than 7.25

variable.name: ICC3BII
variable.description: C3bii. Nature of event. Record venous blood pH level

variable.name: ICC3CI
variable.description: C3ci. Nature of event. Was serum HCO/3 less than 15 mEq/L

variable.name: ICC3CII
variable.description: C3cii. Nature of event. Record serum HCO/3 if available

variable.name: ICC4
variable.description: C4. Nature of event. Health care: was patient treated

variable.name: ICC4A
variable.description: C4a. Nature of event. Was the patient treated within a health care facility: emergency room

variable.name: ICC4B
variable.description: C4b. Nature of event. Was the patient treated within a health care facility: inpatient hospitalization

variable.name: ICC5A
variable.description: C5a. Nature of event. Occurrence of episode: omission of insulin

variable.name: ICC5B
variable.description: C5b. Nature of event. Occurrence of episode: pump malfunction

variable.name: ICC5C
variable.description: C5c. Nature of event. Occurrence of episode: illness

variable.name: ICC5D
variable.description: C5d. Nature of event. Occurrence of episode: other

variable.name: ICC5DOTH
variable.description: C5d. Nature of event. Occurrence of episode: specify

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: A4. Identifying information. Deidentified form date

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: A2. Identifying information. Deidentified patient ID

variable.name: ICB1ADAT
variable.description: B1a. Recognition of event. Deidentified date of occurrence

variable.name: ICB2BDAT
variable.description: B2b. Recognition of event. Deidentified date clinic learned of the event
